name: Introduction to Linguistics
description: An introduction to the discipline of linguistics, covering the history, major theoretical schools of thought, and the structure of language.

name: Introduction to Pragmatics
description: An introduction to the field of Pragmatics, covering the history, key theories, and applications of Pragmatics.

name: Intercultural Pragmatics
description: A course on the intercultural aspects of Pragmatics, including the effects of culture, language, and context on communicative interactions.

name: Pragmatic Analysis
description: An advanced course on the analysis of Pragmatic language, covering theories, methods, and techniques used to interpret communicative interactions.
